content: sweet oddity art bouncy bugs crochet pattern https //www etsy com/shop/sweetoddityart copyright 2023 of sweet oddity art you are not allowed to sell this pattern you are not allowed to distribute or publish this pattern in any form you are not allowed to alter this pattern in any form sweet oddity art 1 pattern details size 6 inches from front of head to back with weight 4 yarn and a 3 25 mm hook skill level needed intermediate- suitable for novice crocheters requires patience and precisions when assembling the bugs and basic crochet skills contact info if you have any questions or concerns about this pattern please do not hesitate to contact me i will get back to you within 24 hours sweetoddityart@gmail com https //www etsy com/shop/sweetoddityart materials needed yarn worsted weight #4 approximately 75g of main color and 50g of accent colors hook size f hook or 3 75 mm caterpillar 14 mm safety eyes bee 18 mm safety eyes butterfly 16 mm safety eyes scissors sewing needle stitch marker fiberfill stuffing abbreviations magic_ring= magic_ring- crochet single_crochet stitches in to the adjustable loop blo= back loops only chain= chain stitch f/o= fasten_off single_crochet= single_crochet stitch half_double_crochet= half_double_crochet sl= slip_stitch flo= front loops only double_crochet= double_crochet stitch inc3= 3 single_crochet in the same stitch bob= bobble stitch increase= increase- make two single_crochet stitches in the same stitch decrease=decrease- crochet two stitches together using the decrease method 4 single_crochet increase x 6= repeat the pattern between parentheses 6 times notes do not join rounds unless stated work in a continuous spiral use a stitch marker to mark the beginning of each round all stitches are worked in both loops unless stated otherwise in the pattern sweet oddity art 2 caterpillar body crocheted from front to back starting with red 1 make 12 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 12 2 increase single_crochet x 6= 18 3 2 single_crochet increase x 6= 24 4-6 single_crochet in each st around 7 increase 3 single_crochet x 6= 30 place eyes between rounds 4 and 5 leaving 11 holes apart from each other change to black *antennae chain 6 double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next 4 chains* 8 12 single_crochet antennae 4 single_crochet antennae 14 single_crochet 9 single_crochet bob 24 single_crochet bob 3 single_crochet change to orange 10-12 single_crochet in each st around stuff the caterpillar as you work 13 single_crochet bob 24 single_crochet bob 3 single_crochet change to black 14-15 single_crochet in each st around change to yellow 16 4 single_crochet increase x 6= 36 17-18 single_crochet in each st around 19 2 single_crochet bob 29 single_crochet bob 3 single_crochet change to black 20-21 single_crochet in each st around change to green 22-23 single_crochet in each st around 24 2 single_crochet bob 29 single_crochet bob 3 single_crochet change to black 25 4 single_crochet decrease x 6= 30 26 single_crochet in each st around change to blue 27-29 single_crochet in each st around 30 2 single_crochet bob 23 single_crochet bob 3 single_crochet change
